item.description:
“Financial obstacles was voted the number one limitation standing between individuals and their dreams”
In light of today’s diminishing economy and our vanishing 401K’s, come meet Sylvia Guinan at our March AWBL meeting.  Her unique style helps women focus and prioritize their financial goals where they currently stand and gives them confidence in making financial decisions. 

Sylvia will  highlight a few simple ideas, including how to:

  • Create clarity, consolidation and a sense of control 
  • Help identify a clear view of retirement at any age


If you are single, married, widowed or divorced; an employee, an employer or a solopreneur; you won’t want to miss Sylvia’s insights for a brighter financial future now!


Sylvia holds an MBA from ST John’s University. She has just released her book “Women Entrepreneur Extraordinaire” which she has co-authoredThrough Thrive Publishing. She serves as Chairman of the Board for the Eastern CT division of The American Heart Association as well as other local committees on the shoreline.
item.name: Gain insights for a brighter financial future now!
